languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, ошибки нет. Госпожа Теодора до вас также была Лорд-капитаном. Не воспринимайте ваш титул буквально — думайте о нем как о священном сане, не имеющем отдельных форм для того, кто обладает Патентом. Вы избраны самим {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императором{/g} для несения почетного бремени {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:HighGothic}Высокий готический{/g}, из которого произошел этот титул — весьма формальный язык, так что ему свойственно отсутствие некоторой гибкости".

traits.locale_text: "Ваша светлость, ошибки нет. Госпожа Теодора до вас также была Лорд-капитаном. Не воспринимайте ваш титул буквально — думайте о нем как о священном сане, обозначающем, что вы избраны самим {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императором{/g} для несения почетного бремени {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:HighGothic}Высокий готический{/g}, из которого произошел этот титул — весьма формальный язык, так что ему свойственно отсутствие некоторой гибкости".

languages.text: "There is no mistake, Your Ladyship. Lady Theodora before you was also the Lord Captain. Do not take your title literally — think of it as a sacred rank that remains unchanging no matter who bears the Warrant. You have been chosen by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} to carry the honourable burden of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:HighGothic}High Gothic{/g}, whence this title originates, is a highly formal language, and so a certain level of inflexibility is to be expected."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, ошибки нет. Госпожа Теодора до вас также была Лорд-капитаном. Не воспринимайте ваш титул буквально — думайте о нем как о священном сане, не имеющем отдельных форм для того, кто обладает Патентом. Вы избраны самим {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императором{/g} для несения почетного бремени {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:HighGothic}Высокий готический{/g}, из которого произошел этот титул — весьма формальный язык, так что ему свойственно отсутствие некоторой гибкости".

traits.locale_text: "There is no mistake, Your Ladyship. Lady Theodora before you was also the Lord Captain. Do not take your title literally — think of it as a sacred rank that remains unchanging no matter who bears the Warrant. You have been chosen by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} to carry the honourable burden of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:HighGothic}High Gothic{/g}, whence this title originates, is a highly formal language, and so a certain level of inflexibility is to be expected."

"There is no mistake, Your Ladyship. Lady Theodora before you was also the Lord Captain. Do not take your title literally — think of it as a sacred rank that remains unchanging no matter who bears the Warrant. You have been chosen by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} to carry the honourable burden of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:HighGothic}High Gothic{/g}, whence this title originates, is a highly formal language, and so a certain level of inflexibility is to be expected."

"There is no mistake, Your Ladyship. Lady Theodora before you was also the Lord Captain. Do not take your title literally — think of it as a sacred rank that remains unchanging no matter who bears the Warrant. You have been chosen by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} to carry the honourable burden of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:HighGothic}High Gothic{/g}, whence this title originates, is a highly formal language, and so a certain level of inflexibility is to be expected."

"There is no mistake, Your Ladyship. Lady Theodora before you was also the Lord Captain. Do not take your title literally — think of it as a sacred rank that remains unchanging no matter who bears the Warrant. You have been chosen by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} to carry the honourable burden of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:HighGothic}High Gothic{/g}, whence this title originates, is a highly formal language, and so a certain level of inflexibility is to be expected."

languages.text: “并没有说错，领主舰长大人。您之前的西奥多拉夫人，她的称谓也同样是‘领主’舰长。不必从字面上理解这个称谓，只要把它当做一个神圣的头衔即可。无论是谁获得了授状，都会得到这个头衔。您是被{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}选中的人，肩负着{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}的光荣重任。这个头衔源自{g|Encyclopedia:HighGothic}高哥特语{/g}，因此您可以想象得到，它在用来称呼他人的时候，在某种程度上并不灵活。”
languages.original_text: "There is no mistake, Your Ladyship. Lady Theodora before you was also the Lord Captain. Do not take your title literally — think of it as a sacred rank that remains unchanging no matter who bears the Warrant. You have been chosen by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} to carry the honourable burden of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:HighGothic}High Gothic{/g}, whence this title originates, is a highly formal language, and so a certain level of inflexibility is to be expected."

traits.locale_text: “并没有说错，领主舰长大人。您之前的西奥多拉夫人，她的称谓也同样是‘领主’舰长。不必从字面上理解这个称谓，只要把它当做一个神圣的头衔即可。无论是谁获得了许可证，都会得到这个头衔。您是被{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}选中的人，肩负着{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}的光荣重任。这个头衔源自{g|Encyclopedia:HighGothic}高哥特语{/g}，因此您可以想象得到，它在用来称呼他人的时候，在某种程度上并不灵活。”

languages.text: 「間違いではありません。あなたの前のテオドラ様もロード・キャプテンでした。その称号を文字通りに受け取らないでください。誰が任命されても変わることのない神聖な地位だと思ってください。あなたは{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}ローグトレーダー{/g}という名誉ある重責を担うべく、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}に選ばれたのです。この称号の由来である{g|Encyclopedia:HighGothic}上位帝国語{/g}は非常にフォーマルな言語であるため、ある程度の融通の利かなさは予想されることでしょうが」
languages.original_text: "There is no mistake, Your Ladyship. Lady Theodora before you was also the Lord Captain. Do not take your title literally — think of it as a sacred rank that remains unchanging no matter who bears the Warrant. You have been chosen by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} to carry the honourable burden of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:HighGothic}High Gothic{/g}, whence this title originates, is a highly formal language, and so a certain level of inflexibility is to be expected."

traits.locale_text: 「間違いではありません。あなたの前のテオドラ様もロード・キャプテンでした。その称号を文字通りに受け取らないでください。誰が任命されても変わることのない神聖な地位だと思ってください。あなたは{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}ローグトレーダー{/g}という名誉ある重責を担うべく、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}に選ばれたのです。この称号の由来である{g|Encyclopedia:HighGothic}上位帝国語{/g}は非常にフォーマルな言語であるため、ある程度の融通の利かなさは予想されることでしょうが」

languages.text: "Da liegt kein Fehler vor, Eure Ladyschaft. Auch Lady Theodora vor Euch war der Lord Captain. Nehmt den Titel nicht wörtlich – seht ihn als heiligen Rang, der unverändert bleibt, wer immer den Handelsbrief trägt. Ihr wurdet vom {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} auserkoren, die ehrenhafte Bürde des {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlers{/g} zu tragen. Das {g|Encyclopedia:HighGothic}Hochgotische{/g}, dem dieser Titel entstammt, ist eine überaus formelle Sprache, mit einem gewissen Maß an mangelnder Flexibilität ist daher zu rechnen."
languages.original_text: "There is no mistake, Your Ladyship. Lady Theodora before you was also the Lord Captain. Do not take your title literally — think of it as a sacred rank that remains unchanging no matter who bears the Warrant. You have been chosen by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} to carry the honourable burden of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:HighGothic}High Gothic{/g}, whence this title originates, is a highly formal language, and so a certain level of inflexibility is to be expected."

traits.locale_text: "Da liegt kein Fehler vor, Eure Ladyschaft. Auch Lady Theodora vor Euch war der Lord Captain. Nehmt den Titel nicht wörtlich – seht ihn als heiligen Rang, der unverändert bleibt, wer immer den Handelsbrief trägt. Ihr wurdet vom {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} auserkoren, die ehrenhafte Bürde des {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlers{/g} zu tragen. Das {g|Encyclopedia:HighGothic}Hochgotische{/g}, dem dieser Titel entstammt, ist eine überaus formelle Sprache, mit einem gewissen Maß an mangelnder Flexibilität ist daher zu rechnen."

languages.text: « Ce n'est pas une erreur, Votre Seigneurie. Dame Théodora avant vous était également seigneure-capitaine. Ne prenez pas votre titre au pied de la lettre, considérez-le plutôt comme un statut sacré et immuable, quel que soit le porteur de la lettre de marque. Vous avez été {mf|désigné|désignée} par l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} pour exercer l'honorable charge de {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g}. Le {g|Encyclopedia:HighGothic}haut gothique{/g}, d'où provient ce titre, est une langue extrêmement solennelle, et il faut donc s'attendre à un certain niveau de rigidité. »
languages.original_text: "There is no mistake, Your Ladyship. Lady Theodora before you was also the Lord Captain. Do not take your title literally — think of it as a sacred rank that remains unchanging no matter who bears the Warrant. You have been chosen by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} to carry the honourable burden of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:HighGothic}High Gothic{/g}, whence this title originates, is a highly formal language, and so a certain level of inflexibility is to be expected."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est pas une erreur, Votre Seigneurie. Dame Théodora avant vous était également seigneure-capitaine. Ne prenez pas votre titre au pied de la lettre, considérez-le plutôt comme un statut sacré et immuable, quel que soit le porteur de la lettre de marque. Vous avez été {mf|désigné|désignée} par l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} pour exercer l'honorable charge de {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g}. Le {g|Encyclopedia:HighGothic}haut gothique{/g}, d'où provient ce titre, est une langue extrêmement solennelle, et il faut donc s'attendre à un certain niveau de rigidité. »

languages.text: «No hay ningún error, milady. Lady Theodora, su predecesora, también era Lord Capitán. No se tome el título de forma literal; entiéndalo como un rango sagrado que permanece inmutable sin importar quién posea la Patente. Ha sido elegida por el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} para soportar la honorable carga de los {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciantes Independientes{/g}. El {g|Encyclopedia:HighGothic}Alto Gótico{/g}, de donde proviene el título, es un idioma muy formal, por lo que sufre de cierto grado de inflexibilidad».
languages.original_text: "There is no mistake, Your Ladyship. Lady Theodora before you was also the Lord Captain. Do not take your title literally — think of it as a sacred rank that remains unchanging no matter who bears the Warrant. You have been chosen by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} to carry the honourable burden of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:HighGothic}High Gothic{/g}, whence this title originates, is a highly formal language, and so a certain level of inflexibility is to be expected."

traits.locale_text: «No hay ningún error, milady. Lady Theodora, su predecesora, también era Lord Capitán. No se tome el título de forma literal; entiéndalo como un rango sagrado que permanece inmutable sin importar quién posea la Patente. Ha sido elegida por el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} para soportar la honorable carga de los {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciantes Independientes{/g}. El {g|Encyclopedia:HighGothic}Alto Gótico{/g}, de donde proviene el título, es un idioma muy formal, por lo que sufre de cierto grado de inflexibilidad».

languages.text: "Sürçme söz konusu değil Leydi Hazretleri. Selefiniz Leydi Theodora da Lord Kaptan'dı. Ünvanınızı kelime manasıyla değil, Ruhsatname kimin elinde olursa olursun değişmeyen kutsal bir makam olarak düşünün. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} tarafından, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} yükümlülüğünü taşımak üzere seçildiniz. Bu ünvanın da menşei olan {g|Encyclopedia:HighGothic}Yüce Gotik{/g}, fevkalade resmî bir dildir. Dolayısıyla bazı katı kuralları olması kaçınılmaz."
languages.original_text: "There is no mistake, Your Ladyship. Lady Theodora before you was also the Lord Captain. Do not take your title literally — think of it as a sacred rank that remains unchanging no matter who bears the Warrant. You have been chosen by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} to carry the honourable burden of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:HighGothic}High Gothic{/g}, whence this title originates, is a highly formal language, and so a certain level of inflexibility is to be expected."
